pt.title: Private Car Saigon → Phan Thiet / Mui Ne
pt.h1: Best Private Car Transfer from Ho Chi Minh to Phan Thiet / Mui Ne
pt.subtitle: New 4–7–16 seat cars, professional drivers, fixed price, door-to-door pickup in HCMC.
why: New cars with strong A/C and reclining seats.
Experienced drivers familiar with Phan Thiet route.
No sharing, no shuttle, private ride only.
Flexible rest stops during the trip.
pt.priceTitle: Price List — Saigon → Phan Thiet / Mui Ne
pt.priceNote: All prices include tolls, expressway fees, and driver service.
route: Pickup anywhere in HCMC or Tan Son Nhat Airport.
Drive through the Long Thanh – Dau Giay Expressway.
Optional rest stops for food and restroom.
Drop-off at your hotel in Phan Thiet / Mui Ne.

faq.q: How long is the trip from Saigon to Phan Thiet?
Is it a shared or private car?
faq.a: All transfers are private. No sharing.
